name: removable_past
short_description: To remove information posted previously on Internet seems impossible, this is a project that was designed for the SERVERY Celtic project http://projects.celtic-initiative.org/servery/. The idea is to post only references to objects and a plugin in the users browser is in charge to publish the object as if it was really publish on Internet, except it was posted on a secure server, where it could be managed exclusively by the user, and where it's not subject to analysis by Internet providers.
summary: To make it possible to remove information posted on Internet
